task.title: Configuring LI purging function with local CLI
task.shortdesc: With liPurgeTask and liPurgeStatus parameters of liconf command, it is possible to remove all targets from the CMM based on LIC ID.

step.info: The purge removes all targets from the CMM for a specific LIC ID. After that, no IRI events or CC data is sent via the X2 interface to the MDF. The ADMF needs to re-activate targets after purge.

step.cmd: Check the status of the purge.

plentry.pd: The purge is not ongoing and the target list is empty.
The CMM has targets for specific a LIC ID and the purge is not ongoing.

note.p: The purge for small number of targets is fast that usually liStatusOfPurge parameter shows value none.

The purge for larger number of targets takes longer time and it is possible to see with liStatusOfPurge parameter that the purge is ongoing. Purge of very large number of targets takes about 1 minute.
